messages.title: Dear Neighbour
messages.content: On 7th May Britain has the opportunity to choose a new Government. I am asking for your support. Take a moment to read what I stand for.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More affordable housing and an effective regulation of the Private Rented Sector
Opposing this Government's attack on the poorest people
Promoting fairness and equality and tackling racism wherever it arises

issues.socialWelfare: Opposing this Government's attack on the poorest people.

housing.content: More affordable housing and an effective regulation of the Private Rented Sector

leaflet.personalStatement: I am privileged to represent the people of Islington North. I work with all communities and individuals to ensure we remain a united force for change. This Government is letting ordinary working people down. Society is more divided and many local people are feeling let out of work. I stand for a fairer Britain and a fairer world.
leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S.: I would be grateful if you could display the poster on the reverse of this letter in your window.
